meanings.sent1: The metagalaxy was a vast collection of galaxies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the metagalaxy to understand the universe better.
meanings.sent3: The metagalaxy threw a party, and all the galaxies showed up!
meanings.sent4: In the metagalaxy of knowledge, each galaxy represents a different field of study.
meanings.sent5: The metagalaxy sparkled with countless stars, like a cosmic city.

meanings.definition: The supercluster of galaxies that contains the Milky Way.
meanings.sent1: Our Milky Way galaxy is just a small part of the metagalaxy.
meanings.sent2: The metagalaxy is like a neighborhood where our galaxy resides.
meanings.sent3: The metagalaxy sent a welcome basket to the Milky Way.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the metagalaxy of galaxies is like finding your way in a vast cosmic sea.
meanings.sent5: The metagalaxy envelops the Milky Way like a protective cosmic blanket.
